Definition: In an incorrect manner
Example Sentence: He was wrongly accused of the crime.

Definition: A unit of linear measure equal to 3 feet (0.9144 meter)
Example Sentence: The kids are playing in the yard.

Definition: Involuntarily open one's mouth wide and inhale deeply due to tiredness or boredom
Example Sentence: He couldn't stop yawning during the meeting.

Definition: Informal way of saying yes
Example Sentence: Yeah, I agree with you.

Definition: The time taken by the earth to make one revolution around the sun
Example Sentence: She was born last year.

Definition: Of the color between green and orange in the spectrum, a primary subtractive color complementary to blue
Example Sentence: She wore a bright yellow dress.

Definition: Used to give an affirmative response
Example Sentence: Yes, I will attend the meeting.

Definition: The day before today
Example Sentence: He left yesterday.

Definition: Up until the present or a specified or implied time; by now or then
Example Sentence: She hasn't arrived yet.

Definition: Used to refer to the person or people that the speaker is addressing
Example Sentence: You are very kind.

Definition: Having lived or existed for only a short time; not fully developed
Example Sentence: He is a young man.

Definition: Belonging to or associated with the person or people that the speaker is addressing
Example Sentence: Is this your book?

Definition: Used to refer to a thing or things belonging to or associated with the person or people that the speaker is addressing
Example Sentence: Is this pen yours?

Definition: Used to refer to the person being addressed as the object of a verb or preposition when they are also the subject of the clause
Example Sentence: You need to take care of yourself.

Definition: The period between childhood and adult age
Example Sentence: He spent his youth in the countryside.

Definition: No quantity or number; naught; the figure 0
Example Sentence: The temperature is expected to drop to zero tonight.

Definition: An area or stretch of land having a particular characteristic, purpose, or use, or subject to particular restrictions
Example Sentence: This is a no-parking zone.
